long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sodaphonic is the easiest way to record your voice, musical instrument, or anything else directly in the browser. Click a single button to record and then again to save your audio masterpiece as an mp3 file.
